metadata.synopsis: The necromancer is sending a zombie to light the candles that start an arcane ritual which drains the player's hitpoints and ultimately turns them into a zombie, after the player has extinguished them.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Use ReCon command "oe Necromancer_Audience"- Wait for the Necromancer's turn in combat, he will send a zombie to light a candle.- When that zombie starts running to the candle, kill it with Ctrl+Shift+K.- On the Necromancer's next turn, he will send another zombie and play this AD.

0.speaker: Balthazar
0.context: NodeContext: Urgent command to a zombie lackey during combat

1.text: Don't just stand there - get those candles lit!
